MWC.GUI.Properties

Class PlainPropertyEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Properties.PlainPropertyEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AWTPropertyEditor, SwingPropertyEditor2

    public abstract class PlainPropertyEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Class defining GUI-independent part of property editing. AWT Portion is implemented in @see MWC.GUI.Properties.AWT.AWTPropertyEditor Property editing works roughly like this:
